DOC.brief_summary: This study single site , double-blind , randomize , cross-over study design compare effect flax oil fish oil supplementation oxylipin profile healthy male female . Eligible participant complete two ( 2 ) Supplementation Phases ( flax oil versus fish oil ) ask attend 6 in-person clinic visit ( 0 , 1 , 3 , 7 , 14 28 day ) blood urine collection phase . Participants consume 8 capsule day 28 day contain either A ) Flax Oil 4 gram ALA per day , one phase B ) Fish Oil dose 4 gram DHA + 0.8 gram EPA per day next phase . Participants randomize blind therefore know supplement take either phase .
DOC.brief_title: Gender Effects Dietary Omega-3 Fatty Acids From Plant Marine Sources Oxylipins Healthy Humans
DOC.detailed_description: This single site , double-blind , randomize , crossover study design compare effect dietary omega-3 fatty acid flax oil versus fish oil supplementation oxylipin profile time ( 0 4 week ) healthy male female . Recruitment consist total six ( 6 ) male six ( 6 ) female participant . Participants recruit advertisement local community . The study conduct Asper Centre Clinical Research , St. Boniface Hospital . Participants ask provide write informed consent prior participation study . Participants provide write consent ask attend in-patient visit provide fast blood sample . Should participant eligible participate , schedule minimum 6 week Run-in Period , 4 week Supplementation Phase , minimum 6 week Wash-out Period second 4 week Supplementation Phase ; Supplementation Phase 6 in-person visit ( 0 , 1 , 3 , 7 , 14 28 day ) obtain fast blood urine sample completion Study Checklist . During 4 week Supplementation Phase , participant consume capsule contain flax oil dose 4 gram ALA/day , capsule contain fish oil dose 4 gram DHA + 0.8 gram EPA/day . A 3-Day Food Record Activity Questionnaire complete Day 0 visit week 3 Supplementation Phase . Provision flax oil fish oil capsule allow study double-blinded . Blinding reduce potential bias data collection evaluation study endpoint . Both research team participant blind time randomization duration study . Randomization use avoid bias assignment ; increase likelihood know unknown participant characteristic evenly balance across various test group ; enhance validity statistical comparison across test group .
DOC.criteria: Participants must meet follow criterion eligible participation study : 1 . Male , nonpregnant , nonlactating premenopausal female , ≥18 ≤50 year age ; 2 . Normal blood lipid profile ( total cholesterol < 5.2 mmol/L , LDLcholesterol < 3.4 mmol/L , HDLcholesterol > 0.9 mmol/L , triglycerides < 1.7 mmol/L ) , plasma creatinine < 1.5× upper limit normal ( ULN ) normal range 5097 µmol/L , glycated hemoglobin < 6 % ; aspartate transaminase ( AST ) < 2× ULN normal range 10 32 U/L , alanine transaminase ( ALT ) < 2× ULN normal range < 25 U/L ; 3 . Blood pressure < 140/90 ; 4 . Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 28 ; 5 . Stable regime take vitamin mineral/dietary/herbal supplement past 1 month participate study ; 6 . Willing maintain stable level activity participate study ; 7 . Willing maintain dietary routine refrain consume omega3 supplement omega3 rich food ( > 0.3 gram ALA/serving , > 0.1 gram EPA + DHA/serving ) acceptance study final study visit ; 8 . Females must normal menses birth control ; 9 . Agrees donate blood participate study 2 month participation study . 10 . Willing comply protocol requirement procedures ; 11 . Willing provide inform consent . Participants exclude follow : 1 . Presence clinically diagnose disease affect circulatory , respiratory , immune , skeletal , urinary , muscular , endocrine , digestive , nervous reproductive system , disease condition require currently require medical treatment ; 2 . Taking prescribed medication , regular use acetylsalicylic acid ( e.g . Aspirin ) , ibuprofen ( e.g . Advil ) acetaminophen ( e.g . Tylenol ) within last 3 month ; 3 . Allergy sensitivity study product ingredient , flax , flax oil , marine source oil fish shellfish . 4 . Cigarette/cigar smoking use tobacco product within past 12 month study ; 5 . Body weight stable ( ±3 kg ) past 6 month ; 6 . Consumption > 15 alcoholic beverage per week ( accord Canada 's LowRisk Alcohol Drinking Guidelines , 2012 ) within last 3 month participate study ; 7 . Current ( within past 30 day ) bacterial , viral fungal infection ; 8 . Unable obtain blood sample screen and/or week 0 visit . 9 . Donated blood collect 2 month prior participation study .
